songs.title: Break Up With Your Girlfriend, I’m Bored (BBC Radio 1 Live Lounge)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You got me some kind of way (Hmm)
Ain't used to feelin' this way (Mmm-mmm)
I do not know what to say (Yeah, yeah)
But I know I shouldn't think about it
Took one freakin' look at your face (Hmm)
Now I wanna know how you taste (Mmm-mmm)
Usually don't give it away (Yeah, yeah)
But you know I'm out here thinkin' 'bout it

[Pre-Chorus]
Then I realize she's right there
And I'm at home like, "Damn, this ain't fair"

[Chorus]
Break up with your girlfriend (Girlfriend)
'Cause I'm bored
You could hit it in the mornin' (In the Mornin')
Like it's yours
I know it ain't right
But I don't care (Care)
Break up with your girlfriend (Girlfriend)
'Cause I'm bored

[Verse 2]
This shit always happen to me (Mmm-mmm)
Why can't we just play for keeps? (Mmm-mmm)
Practically on my knees (Yeah, yeah)
But I know I shouldn't think about it
You know what you're doin' to me
You're singin' my songs in the streets, yeah, yeah
Actin' all innocent, please
When I know you out here thinkin' 'bout it

[Pre-Chorus]
Then you realize she's right there (Yeah)
And you're at home like, "Damn, she can't compare"

[Chorus]
Break up with your girlfriend (Girlfriend)
'Cause I'm bored
You could hit it in the mornin' (In the mornin')
Like it's yours
I know it ain't right
But I don't care (I don't care, yeah)
Break up with your girlfriend
'Cause I'm bored

[Bridge]
You could say I'm hatin' if you want to
But I only hate on her 'cause I want you
Say I'm trippin' if you feel like
But you without me ain't right (Ain't right)
You could call me crazy 'cause I want you
And I never even ever freakin' met you
Say I'm trippin' and it ain't right
But you without me ain't nice (Ain't nice, yeah)

[Chorus]
Break up with your girlfriend (With your girlfriend)
'Cause I'm bored
You could hit it in the mornin' (In the mornin')
Like it's yours
I know it ain't right
But I don't care (Care, yeah)
Break up with your girlfriend (With your girlfriend)
'Cause I'm bored

[Post-Chorus]
With your girlfriend, girlfriend
With your girlfriend, girlfriend
With your girlfriend
